entries.content: Objections are not rejections; they are part of the process to find the right prospects.
entries.notes: Emphasizes that 'no' is a step closer to 'yes'.

entries.content: Most people are reasonable and will politely exit if not interested, not hostile.
Pressure on calls is self-generated; control your response to objections.
Use structured questions to move prospects from intellect to emotion, reducing objections.
Objections are info requests; they indicate engagement, not rejection.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
